titles.title: Rural Economic Development and Opportunities Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an incentive for expanding employment in rural areas by allowing employers the work opportunity credit for hiring residents of rural areas.
Rural Economic Development and Opportunities Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Rural Economic Development and Opportunities Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include rural area residents among members of a targeted group for purposes of the work opportunity credit for a five-year period.
